text: while these three gentlemen really don't

getting together two of whom had served

were just going to have a fun reunion up
in Paris and ended up engaging a
potential catastrophic situation and
pinning down someone who clearly was

because of their teamwork it's fair to

on France I had a opportunity to talk to

and I just want to make sure that having

who make me extraordinarily optimistic
and hopeful about our future and I want
to thank each and every one of them and
